Bundesliga
Bayern: the Wenger candidacy not retained?
French coach Arsene Wenger was the favorite to replace Niko Kovac at the head of Bayern Munich. But the Bavarian club has delivered a negative response to the Alsatian.
07 Nov 2019, 17:12 by Mourad Bennis



Niko KovacOn post since 2018, Niko Kovac has resigned to its leaders after the heavy disappointment against Frankfurt. Discover the names of his possible successors.Icon Sport

Bayern Munich: the tracks to replace Niko Kovac




Bayern Munich would have made a strong decision on the candidacy of Ars√®ne Wenger for the post of coach, left vacant since the departure of Croatian Niko Kovac

A failure for Wenger?




Arsene Wenger + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Munich leaders have decided not to give the post of Bayern coach to French Arsene Wenger, according to Bild journalist Christian Falk. If this is confirmed, it would be a serious setback for the 70-year-old Alsatian technician.
